/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with trees on both sides, their leaves a vibrant green against the backdrop of the clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. The street itself is devoid of any traffic or pedestrians, adding a sense of tranquility to the image. In the distance, buildings can be seen, their details softened by the perspective. The image is bathed in the light of day, highlighting the colors and details of the scene.
